long_description: Ace your alpine adventures with the Mountain Hardwear Chockstone Pants for men. They're durable, super stretchy and cut just right for maximum mobility. Chockstone(TM) double-weave, nylon/spandex soft-shell fabric is wind and water resistant, and breathable. Micro-Chamois(TM)-lined waist provides comfort under a climbing harness. Integrated webbing belt has a buckle closure for easy fit adjustments. Mountain Hardwear Chockstone Pants for men have pockets galore for storage. Inseam gusset and knee articulation free up movement. Inner twill tape tabs let you create your own gaiters.
short_description: Ace your alpine adventures with the Mountain Hardwear Chockstone Pants for men. They're durable, super stretchy and cut just right for maximum mobility.
